name: online-courses-grading-system
description: ➜ system has two types of users, the student and the teacher. </br> ➜ user can be both, teacher on some courses, and student who enrolled into other courses. </br> ➜ student can enroll into one or more courses. </br> ➜ teacher can teach one or more courses. </br> ➜ course can have one or many students. </br> ➜ course can be teached by only one teacher. </br> ➜ course has one or more tests. </br> ➜ test has one or more test results. </br>
